name: Exploring Iceland
description:
3D VR (Virtual Reality) driving environment game originally created to promote the Tarleton Iceland Landscape Photography Study Abroad program to give students a first glimpse of what they might explore in Iceland. Since it's first iteration, the game has evolved to accommodate and entertain a much wider scope, soon to be publicly available for download and play.

There are some hidden Easter Eggs. 

Knut LSG Hybinette and Megan Ehrhart - Designers
